name: Seirai Island
description:
After any character on either side is healed: That character gains Distant Storm. (Takes 2 Piercing DMG at the End Phase. Can be used once)
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character on either side is healed:</color> That character gains $[K1025]. (Takes 2 Piercing DMG at the End Phase. Can be used once)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character on either side is healed:</color> That character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Distant Storm</color>. (Takes 2 Piercing DMG at the End Phase. Can be used once)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>: 2</color>
storytext: "The great battle where the sea and sky changed color have become lost to time, but the vast storms that were called upon at this time still remain."
